title: Crossbows (skill)
data:
***Obsolete**: This article refers to an aspect of the game which has been removed. It is retained for historical reference only.*

*This page refers to the obsolete skill. For the new skill, see [Ranged Weapons](/Ranged_Weapons "Ranged Weapons"). For the obsolete item, see [crossbow (item)](/Crossbow_\(item\) "Crossbow (item)").*

The **Crossbows** skills governs a character's mastery of [hand crossbows](/Hand_crossbow "Hand crossbow"), [arbalests](/Arbalest "Arbalest") and [triple crossbows](/Triple_crossbow "Triple crossbow"). Crossbows fire [bolts](/Bolt "Bolt") and are slower than [bows](/Bows "Bows"), but tend to be more accurate and hit harder early on.

## Contents

- [1 Aptitudes](#Aptitudes)
- [2 List of Crossbows](#List_of_Crossbows)
- [3 See Also](#See_Also)
- [4 History](#History)

## Aptitudes

- [Hunter](/Hunter "Hunter")

## History

- The Crossbows skill was merged into [Ranged Weapons](/Ranged_Weapons "Ranged Weapons") in 0.29.

html:
Crossbows (skill)

From CrawlWiki
Jump to: navigation, search
Obsolete: This article refers to an aspect of the game which has been removed. It is retained for historical reference only.

This page refers to the obsolete skill. For the new skill, see Ranged Weapons. For the obsolete item, see crossbow (item).

The Crossbows skills governs a character's mastery of hand crossbows, arbalests and triple crossbows. Crossbows fire bolts and are slower than bows, but tend to be more accurate and hit harder early on.

Contents

  • 1 Aptitudes
  • 2 List of Crossbows
  • 3 See Also
  • 4 History

Aptitudes

List of Crossbows

Hand crossbow 12 +5 15 Bolt Non-melee 10
Arbalest 18 +2 19 Bolt Non-melee 10
Triple crossbow 22 0 23 Bolt Non-melee 2

See Also

  • Hunter
  • Arcane Marksman

History

  • The Crossbows skill was merged into Ranged Weapons in 0.29.
